GeomProc
  • User Guide

User GuideÔÉÅ

Note that there is no need to load submodules of the library, as all the classes and functions in the submodules are made visible in the main module geomproc.

Main classes

  • Triangle mesh: geomproc.mesh

  • Point cloud: geomproc.pcloud

  • Implicit function: geomproc.impsurf

  • Volume: geomproc.volume

Data loading

  • geomproc.loading.load() - Load data from a file and create a triangle mesh or point cloud object

Mesh creation

  • geomproc.creation.create_cone() - Create a cone

  • geomproc.creation.create_cylinder() - Create a cylinder

  • geomproc.creation.create_open_surface() - Create a 2D parametric surface

  • geomproc.creation.create_sphere() - Create a sphere

  • geomproc.creation.create_subdivided_cube() - Create a cube subdivided into smaller faces

  • geomproc.creation.create_torus() - Create a torus

Misc mesh creation

  • geomproc.creation.create_points() - Create mesh geometry to display a set of points

  • geomproc.creation.create_vectors() - Create mesh geometry to display a set of vectors

  • geomproc.creation.create_lines() - Create mesh geometry to display a set of lines

Point cloud creation

  • geomproc.creation.create_sphere_samples() - Sample a set of points from a sphere

Point cloud alignment

  • geomproc.alignment.icp() - Align two point clouds with the ICP method

  • geomproc.alignment.spin_images() - Compute shape descriptors for points in a cloud

  • geomproc.alignment.best_match() - Match two point clouds based on shape descriptors

Surface reconstruction

  • geomproc.impsurf.impsurf.setup_rbf() - Reconstruct an implicit surface from a set of point samples

  • geomproc.marching_cubes.marching_cubes() - Reconstruct a mesh from an implicit surface

Voxelization

  • geomproc.volume.voxelize_mesh() - Voxelize a mesh

Auxiliary/miscellaneous functions

  • geomproc.misc.map_val() - Linearly map a set of values to a new range

  • geomproc.misc.hsv2rgb() - Transform a color from the HSV to the RGB color system

  • geomproc.misc.rotation_matrix() - Create a rotation matrix from an axis and angle

  • geomproc.misc.random_triangle_sample() - Randomly sample a point from a triangle

  • geomproc.misc.distance() - Euclidean distance between two points

  • geomproc.transform() - Initialize geometric transformations

Axuliary classes

  • geomproc.graph - Graph

  • geomproc.kdtree.KDTree - KDTree for efficient point queries (partially third-party software)
